resources.string: Deenbandhu Chhotu Ram University of Science & Technology, Murthal came into being on 6th November 2006 by upgrading erstwhile Chhotu Ram State College of Engineering, Murthal through an Act 29 of 2006 of the Legislature of the state of Haryana with the vision to facilitate and promote studies and research in emerging areas of higher education with focus on new frontiers of science, engineering, technology, architecture and management studies, humanities, and also to achieve excellence in these and connected fields. The University has been considered eligible for grants under Section 12(B) of UGC Act, 1956 in March, 2009.

Department of Computer Science & Engineering currently runs four programmes, two of which are UG programmes,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programmes are as follows:- -120 for Bachelor Of Technology -60 for Bachelor of Computer Applications Intake for PG programme(Master Of Technology) is 30 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering currently runs four programmes, one of which is UG programme,two are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(Bachelor of Technology) is 120 Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -18 for Master Of Technology -18 for Master Of Technology(VLSI Design) Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Electrical Engineering currently runs five programmes, two of which are UG programmes,two are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme are as follows:- -60 for Bachelor Of Technology -60 for Bachelor Of Technology(Hindi) Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -18 for Master Of Technology(Instrumentation & Control) -18 for Master Of Technology(Electric Power System) Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Mechanical Engineering currently runs three programmes, one of which is UG programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(Bachelor of Technology) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Technology) is 18 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Civil Engineering currently runs three programmes, one of which is UG programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(Bachelor of Technology) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Technology(Highway Engineering)) is 18 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Biomedical Engineering currently runs three programmes, one of which is UG programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(Bachelor of Technology) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Technology) is 18 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Chemical Engineering currently runs three programmes, one of which is UG programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(Bachelor of Technology) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Technology) is 18 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Architecture currently runs five programmes, one of which is UG programme,three are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(B.Arch.) is 60. Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -10 for Master Of Architecture(Sustainable Architecture) -20 for Master Of Planning(Urban & Rural) -18 for Master Of Technology(Construction and Real Estate Management) Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Chemistry currently runs three programmes, one of which is Dual Degree programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for Dual Degree programme(B.Sc.(Hons.)-Chemistry + M.Sc.(Chemistry)) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Science(Chemistry)) is 60 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Physics currently runs three programmes, one of which is Dual Degree programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for Dual Degree programme(B.Sc.(Hons.)-Physics + M.Sc.(Physics)) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Science(Physics)) is 60 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Maths currently runs three programmes, one of which is Dual Degree programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for Dual Degree programme(B.Sc.(Hons.)-Maths + M.Sc.(Maths)) is 60 Intake for PG programme(Master Of Science(Maths)) is 60 & intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Biotechnology currently runs five programmes, one of which is UG programme,one is Dual Degree programme,two are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(B.Tech.) is 60. Intake for Dual Degree programme(B.Sc.(Hons.)-Biotechnology + M.Sc.(Biotechnology)) is 60. Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -18 for Master Of Technology -30 for Master Of Science(Biotechnology) Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of CEEES currently runs four programmes, one of which is UG programme,two are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for UG programme(B.Tech.) is 30. Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -18 for Master Of Technology(Energy and Environment Management) -18 for Master Of Science(Environment Science) Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Management currently runs four programmes, one of which is Dual Degree programme,two are PG programmes and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for Dual Degree programme(BBA + MBA) is 60. Intake for PG programmes are as follows:- -60 for Master Of Business Administration -30 for Master In Hospital Administration Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.

Department of Humanities currently runs five programmes, two of which are certificate programmes,one is Dual Degree programme,one is PG programme and one is P.H.D programme. Intake for Certificate Course In French is 30. Intake for Certificate Course In German is 30. Intake for Dual Degree programme(B.A.(Hons.)-English + M.A.(Biotechnology)) is 60. Intake for PG programme(M.A. English) is 30. Intake for P.H.D programme is based on seats availability.
Deenbandhu Chhotu Ram University Of Science & Technology, Murthal
Address:- DCRUST, Murthal, Sonipat, Haryana, India - 131039
